name: X-Grid Series by Omnivoltaic - Hybrid Solar Charge Inverters
content:
###### A Revolution in Hybrid Solar Charge Inverters 

An inverter is a device that helps in converting direct current electricity into alternate current electricity. Inverters are mainly used as a source of power to run devices when there are power cuts. Most of our home appliances require only AC electricity for proper working.

With that being said, Omnivoltaic’s all-in-one hybrid solar charge inverter series is one of the latest testaments to the company's commitment to efficiency, adaptability, and reliability in its X-Grid Series. Let's explore the key features that make the X-Grid Series a game-changer in the realm of solar energy solutions.

**Hybrid Input Functionality:**

At the heart of the X-Grid Series is its hybrid functionality, which seamlessly combines solar energy storage with the ability to charge from alternative sources. Whether harnessing solar energy or drawing power from other sources such as the utility grid and diesel-driven generators, users can rely on the X-Grid Series to keep their systems running smoothly. This feature ensures a consistent power supply even in less-than-ideal conditions.

**AC Sine Wave Output for Stability:**

One of the standout features of the X-Grid Series is its provision of a pure AC sine wave output. This ensures a stable and reliable power supply, crucial for powering sensitive electronic equipment and appliances. The sine wave output is a hallmark of quality inverters, and Omnivoltaic's commitment to this standard sets the X-Grid Series apart in terms of performance and reliability.

**Reliability and Responsiveness with DSP Control and Advanced Algorithms:**

To achieve the highest industry standards of reliability and responsiveness, each product incorporates a Digital Signal Processor (DSP) control and advanced control algorithms. The DSP control enhances the precision and efficiency of the inverter, ensuring optimal performance in various operating conditions. Advanced control algorithms further contribute to the reliability of the X-Grid Series, making it a trustworthy choice for users seeking a cutting-edge and dependable solar energy solution.

**Wide Voltage Range Catering to Diverse Needs:**

Recognizing the diverse needs of solar power systems, the X-Grid Series offers a wide voltage range, spanning from 24V to 48V. This adaptability allows users to tailor their systems according to specific requirements, whether it be a small residential setup or a larger commercial installation. The flexibility in voltage options positions the X-Grid Series as a versatile choice for a broad spectrum of applications.

**The Power to Connect and Expand:**

The X-Grid Series opens up new possibilities with its parallel function, supporting up to nine units. This means you can enlarge your power capacity to accommodate more loads, making it a scalable solution for growing energy needs.

**Advanced Communication and Monitoring:**

Stay in control with the X-Grid Series through its communication options, including external WiFi. Monitor and supervise your system at any time, ensuring that you have real-time insights into your energy production and consumption. The built-in Battery Management System (BMS) for lithium batteries adds an extra layer of intelligence to optimize battery performance and lifespan.

The X-Grid Series doesn't stop at the basics; Some other noteworthy features include:

- Lithium Battery Auto-restart Function: A convenient feature for lithium battery charging, ensuring seamless operation.
- Power Supply Mode: Intelligently distributes power from solar panels, mains, and batteries, optimizing energy usage.
- Voltage Adjustability: Fine-tune the charging voltages to match different battery requirements.
- Slim Body: Facilitates easy installation and transportation, making the X-Grid Series a practical choice.
- Safety First: Battery reverse connection protection with a fuse switch ensures safer installation.
- High Efficiency: With a power factor of 1.0, the X-Grid Series boasts high efficiency, lower consumption, and energy conservation.

As individuals and businesses increasingly embrace sustainable energy solutions, the X-Grid Series exceeds the expectations of a modern solar power inverter, paving the way at the forefront of solar power innovation.

name: About Omnivoltaic the Company
content:
###### Background

Omnivoltaic Energy Solutions Company Limited (OVES) is a corporation registered in Hong Kong, engaging significantly in the off-grid solar energy market since its foundation in 2016. Led by a cadre of experienced technologists and product design specialists from the United States and the United Kingdom, OVES has carved out a leading position in the off-grid electricity sector. This leadership is underscored by its dual focus on manufacturing hardware and distributing products, as well as on developing associated Internet of Things (IoT) software platforms.

###### Growth

The journey of OVES from its establishment has been marked by strategic international expansion and significant investments in local partnerships across various countries. This expansion strategy includes establishing operational footprints in Kenya, Malawi, Mozambique, and extending sales representation to the Philippines, Ethiopia, the Middle East, and the United States. Such global presence has been instrumental in broadening the company’s impact and reach within the off-grid solar market.

###### Winning Strategy

At the core of OVES's success lies a robust investment in product research and development (R&D), primarily located in Shenzhen, China. This strategic focus on R&D has enabled OVES to stay at the forefront of technological innovation in the off-grid electricity sector. Furthermore, OVES has developed an extensive network of Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) and Original Design Manufacturer (ODM) partnerships across China. This network plays a critical role in ensuring a competitive advantage through cost-effective sourcing of key components, product assembly, and testing. The synergy of advanced product technologies from the West combined with efficient production capabilities in China has been a cornerstone of OVES’s winning strategy in the off-grid solar market.

name: About Off-Grid Electric Indusry
content:
###### Background

The term "Off-Grid" describes areas or communities that lack access to a central power grid, find it unreliably serviced, or deem it too costly, prompting individuals or groups to produce their own electricity independently. This situation has fostered the development and adoption of off-grid electric power technologies, primarily focusing on solar power generation and battery energy storage solutions. The shift towards decentralized electricity generation necessitates a distinct approach to product design, installation, servicing, and financing, tailored to the unique needs and constraints of off-grid living.

###### Evolution

Over the years, off-grid electric power technology has matured significantly, becoming more accessible, efficient, and reliable. Solar power, as the most commonly used source of off-grid energy, harnesses sunlight using photovoltaic panels to generate electricity, while battery storage systems store this energy for use when sunlight is not available. This evolution in technology has been driven by advancements in solar panel efficiency, battery storage capacity, and the development of more effective power management systems. These technological advancements have made off-grid solutions a viable and sustainable alternative to traditional power sources, particularly in remote locations where extending the central power grid is not feasible or economically viable.

###### OVES Role

Omnivoltaic Energy Solutions Company Limited (OVES) has played a pivotal role in the advancement of the off-grid electric industry. Renowned for its exceptional product design capabilities and manufacturing quality, OVES has contributed significantly to the sector's growth. The company's focus on meticulous attention to service details and the quality of its product offerings has set industry standards. By integrating innovative technologies with practical design considerations, OVES has helped enhance the accessibility and reliability of off-grid power solutions, making sustainable energy a reality for communities worldwide. Through its commitment to excellence and innovation, OVES continues to drive forward the off-grid electric industry, ensuring that off-grid power remains a competitive, dependable alternative for energy consumers around the globe.

name: About Omnivoltaic Markets
content:
###### Global View

The off-grid market, primarily situated in developing regions, offers an alternative to traditional power grid connectivity, appealing to communities located far from established power distribution networks. This choice is often dictated by geographical challenges, lifestyle preferences, or unique circumstances. The most significant markets for off-grid technologies span across Sub-Saharan Africa, select areas in Southeast Asia and Oceania, as well as certain regions in Latin America. This distribution highlights a global need for alternative energy solutions that can bridge the gap in electricity access, particularly in remote and underserved areas.

###### Great Leap Forward

Off-grid electric power represents a transformative opportunity for developing regions to bypass traditional infrastructure limitations and embrace modern, distributed electricity generation and efficient distribution systems. This leapfrogging potential is facilitated by small Distributed Energy Service Companies (DESCOs), which play a crucial role in service delivery and job creation within these communities. The adoption of off-grid solutions not only addresses immediate energy needs but also fosters sustainable growth by enabling access to reliable electricity, which is a cornerstone for development. This paradigm shift towards off-grid power underscores a move from mere electrification to empowering communities with the tools for economic and social development.

###### OVES Market

Omnivoltaic Energy Solutions Company Limited (OVES) initially marked its presence in the off-grid electricity sector in Africa, rapidly extending its operations across multiple continents. Presently, OVES boasts a network of over 40 distributors and maintains five sales offices worldwide, underscoring its global influence in the off-grid market. By assisting individuals in ascending the "energy ladder," OVES has significantly contributed to broadening the spectrum of off-grid electricity use. The company has evolved beyond providing basic lighting solutions to developing key technologies and products that support a range of applications, from productive tools to transportation. This strategic expansion reflects OVES's commitment to not only meet the basic energy needs of off-grid communities but also to enhance their livelihoods through access to energy-dependent productivity tools and services.

name: About OVES Capabilities
content:
###### Hard Core:  Product Design and Manufacturing

At its heart, Omnivoltaic Energy Solutions Company Limited (OVES) is a pioneer in product hardware design and manufacturing within the off-grid energy sector. What sets OVES apart is its comprehensive engagement across the entire value chain. From the outset, the company delves deep into electric battery storage technology, establishing strategic alliances with leading cell manufacturers, experts in power control electronics, and pack assembly partners renowned for their sophistication. This depth of technological expertise and production know-how enables OVES to collaborate effectively with contractors, ensuring a degree of influence over all production stages. The result is an extensive network of production capabilities and virtually unlimited capacity, all achieved with minimal direct ownership of manufacturing facilities.

###### IoT Integration: Pioneering Digital Connectivity

With a strong conviction in the digital future, OVES has been at the forefront of integrating Internet of Things (IoT) technology into the DNA of off-grid products. This integration ensures that connectivity is embedded at the most fundamental levels, enhancing asset management and user experience by providing visibility into product performance and usage. Such connectivity is not just about technical data; it transforms how off-grid energy solutions are monitored, managed, and improved, paving the way for significant advances in efficiency and customer satisfaction.

###### Expansive Global Distribution

OVES's approach to distribution is as global as its vision, with regional sales offices dedicated to nurturing and supporting an expanding network of distributor partners. Covering key regions such as Africa, Latin America, Asia Pacific, and the Middle East, OVES's distribution network is continuously growing. The company is on a constant quest to forge new partnerships, aiming to extend its reach and impact in providing off-grid energy solutions to a wider audience. This expansive distribution strategy underscores OVES’s commitment to making sustainable energy accessible across the globe.

###### At Client For Client (ACFC): Closing the Loop

Recognizing the critical role of distribution partners in delivering value to end-users, OVES has instituted the At Client For Client (ACFC) programs. These initiatives are designed to bridge the gap between manufacturing and the end-user’s home. By co-locating engineers and service personnel at select client sites, OVES ensures a direct line of communication for troubleshooting and feedback collection. This hands-on approach not only enhances product reliability and customer satisfaction but also fosters a deeper understanding of user needs, driving continuous improvement and innovation in off-grid energy solutions.

name: About Omnivoltaic Products
content:
OVES's product portfolio is designed to cater to a wide range of energy needs, from basic lighting solutions to comprehensive home energy storage systems. Each product line is crafted with the end-user in mind, ensuring accessibility, reliability, and sustainability.

###### Beacon™ and Lumn™: Entry-Level Solar Lanterns

The Beacon™ and Lumn™ solar lanterns represent OVES's commitment to providing essential lighting services at an accessible cost. These entry-level products are designed for easy installation and are renowned for their durability and long-lasting performance. Ideal for areas where traditional electricity access is limited or non-existent, these lanterns serve as a reliable source of light, enhancing the quality of life for users in remote communities.

###### Lumn Home™: Smart Expandable Solar Home Systems

The Lumn Home™ series takes home energy solutions to the next level with smart, expandable Solar Home Systems (SHS). These high-quality systems cater to a household's basic electricity needs, including home lighting, cell-phone charging, and powering small DC appliances such as fans and TVs. Designed for scalability, they can grow with the user's needs, ensuring that expanding energy requirements are met efficiently and sustainably.

###### Camp™ SHS and Packs: Versatile 12VDC Systems

Camp™ SHS and Packs offer a versatile 12VDC system that supports a broad array of appliances, from enhanced home lighting and entertainment systems to small productive tools like sewing machines and barber packs. This range is designed for users looking to elevate their off-grid living experience, offering the flexibility to power both essential and luxury appliances.

###### Oasis™ All-in-One HESS: Home Energy Storage Solutions

The Oasis™ All-in-One Home Energy Storage Systems (HESS) are increasingly popular for off-grid users seeking reliable backup power solutions. Ranging from 1 to 20 kWh packages, Oasis™ provides a variety of system sizes to meet different energy demands. These systems are an excellent choice for households and businesses looking to ensure uninterrupted power supply, enhance energy security, and promote sustainability.

###### Town™ Modular ESS: Flexible Energy Storage

The Town™ series offers modular energy storage solutions that boast flexibility in installation and incremental deployment. These systems can be tailored to provide energy storage ranging from 5kWh to 5MWh, with AC output capabilities from 5kW to 500kW. OVES also offers a comprehensive purchase guide, assisting clients in selecting the right technology and installation options to meet their specific needs.

###### X-Grid™ Components: Customizable Power Solutions

The X-Grid™ series encompasses a wide range of components designed for customization to address diverse power conditions and usage scenarios. This series includes industrial-grade modules and components, ensuring standard-compliant installations that are built to last. Highlights include X-Grid Inverters with multiple DC bus voltages and solar charging capabilities, Lithium Battery Packs compatible with standard DC-fed inverters and MPPT Solar Chargers, and the eMe™ and Chargeverter™ multi-purpose chargers, which integrate e-Mobility battery charging with home power supply. These components are ideal for installers and DIY enthusiasts looking for reliable, long-term energy solutions.

name: About Omnivoltaic Technologies
content:
Omnivoltaic Energy Solutions Company Limited (OVES) stands at the forefront of off-grid electric technologies, a testament to the extensive experience of its founding members in power generation and product design. The team's expertise is not just theoretical but is cemented in patents, technical know-how, and strong supplier-partnerships that span the breadth of off-grid energy solutions. Below, we explore the key technologies that define OVES's innovative approach to off-grid electricity.

###### Off-Grid Triad™

OVES introduced the concept of the Off-Grid Triad™, a comprehensive integration of the three core elements essential to all off-grid systems: Generation, Storage, and Usage. This holistic design paradigm is the foundation of OVES's ability to deliver high-performance yet cost-effective system packages. By meticulously balancing these three elements, OVES ensures that each component works in harmony, leading to systems that are not only efficient but also tailored to the specific needs of off-grid communities.

###### Lithium-ion Battery and Packs

Recognizing the critical role of battery technology in off-grid systems, OVES has dedicated substantial efforts towards developing superior lithium-ion batteries and packs. This process begins with a thorough understanding of the supplier landscape and forging partnerships with reputable cell manufacturers. OVES designs specific Battery Management System (BMS) hardware and firmware, or customizes proven BMS platforms, alongside developing appropriate enclosures that balance cost, longevity, and aesthetic appeal. The result is a versatile range of batteries with bus voltages spanning from 5V to 72V, designed to meet diverse energy storage needs.

###### Solar PV

Specializing in small to medium-sized systems, OVES leverages solar photovoltaic (PV) technology as a key component of its off-grid solutions. The company's expertise lies in configuring the right type of solar panels to meet the varied needs of its systems, ensuring that each setup is optimized for maximum efficiency and reliability. This focus on tailored solar PV configurations underscores OVES's commitment to providing sustainable and effective off-grid energy solutions.

###### High Efficiency DC Appliances

A pivotal aspect of the Off-Grid Triad™ is the emphasis on high-efficiency DC appliances, which are instrumental in driving down the total cost of ownership for off-grid systems. By prioritizing the development and integration of appliances that operate at peak efficiency, OVES significantly reduces the energy requirements of off-grid systems, making them more accessible and sustainable for users.

###### Brushless DC Motors and Controls

OVES has also invested in the development of Permanent Magnet Brushless DC (PMBLDC) motors and controls, which are essential for powering a variety of DC appliances, from fans, sewing machines, grain processors, to compressors inside refrigeration and ice-making systems, to e-mobility drive trains used in electric boats and two- or three-wheelers. The focus on optimizing motor types and control electronics is a testament to OVES's dedication to enhancing the performance and efficiency of off-grid appliances and vehicles.

###### eIoT Sensor-to-Cloud Stack

At the heart of OVES's innovation is the eIoT Sensor-to-Cloud Stack, which embodies the company's vision of integrating every electronic device with cloud connectivity from the outset. This foundational approach ensures that data from off-grid systems can be seamlessly collected, analyzed, and utilized, unlocking new possibilities for remote monitoring, system optimization, and user engagement.

###### eIoT Data As A Service

Building on its robust IoT infrastructure, OVES offers Data as a Service (DaaS), which combines data acquisition, cloud storage, and API access services. This offering enables partners to easily access and derive value from the wealth of data generated by off-grid devices. OVES's substantial investment in IoT capabilities demonstrates its commitment to not just collecting data but making it actionable and valuable for off-grid energy solutions.

Through its pioneering technologies and comprehensive approach to off-grid electricity, OVES is reshaping how energy is generated, stored, and utilized in off-grid communities around the world. The company's innovations not only enhance the efficiency and sustainability of off-grid systems but also empower users with reliable and accessible energy solutions.

name: On the Topic of e-Motorcycle Battery Charging
content:
As the world accelerates toward sustainable transportation, electric motorcycles are taking center stage, especially in regions where mobility needs are vast and diverse. Much like traditional internal combustion engine (ICE) motorcycles rely on fossil fuels, electric motorcycles depend on electrical energy stored in batteries. However, the transition from gasoline stations to electric charging infrastructure presents a more complex challenge, particularly in developing or remote regions such as Africa, Southeast Asia, and Central Asia. To ensure the successful adoption of electric motorcycles, comprehensive power supply solutions must be integrated from the outset, rather than being treated as afterthoughts.

### The Infrastructure Imperative
When we think about the infrastructure supporting electric motorcycles, it's essential to recognize that both batteries and charging facilities are integral components. Batteries are not just passive storage units; they are sophisticated energy-carrying devices. Modern lithium-ion batteries, for instance, are powerful and durable, providing the necessary range and performance that consumers expect. However, these batteries come with their own set of challenges. They are expensive, require significant time to charge, and demand meticulous maintenance to ensure longevity and safety. In fact, the battery alone accounts for approximately 50% of an electric motorcycle’s total cost, making it a significant barrier to widespread adoption, particularly in price-sensitive markets.

### Cost Considerations
While the per-mile incremental cost of electricity for powering an electric motorcycle is roughly 25% of what it costs to fuel an ICE motorcycle with gasoline in most markets, the upfront investment in a battery makes the initial purchase of an electric motorcycle considerably more expensive. This high initial cost is a substantial hurdle, especially in developing regions where consumers may have limited access to financing options or where disposable incomes are lower. The financial barrier posed by battery costs can slow down the adoption rate of electric motorcycles, despite the long-term economic and environmental benefits they offer.

### Simplifying the Charging Experience
One of the key factors that can drive rapid adoption of electric motorcycles is the simplification of the charging experience. If charging an electric motorcycle can be made as straightforward—and even more convenient—than refueling with gasoline, consumers are more likely to make the switch. This requires the development of user-friendly charging solutions that minimize downtime and reduce overall costs. Innovations such as fast-charging stations, battery swapping technologies, and widespread charging networks can play a pivotal role in making electric refueling seamless and efficient.

At the forefront of these innovations is Omnivoltaic, a leader in e-motorcycle battery, fast charging, and swap solutions across Africa, Southeast Asia, and Central Asia. Omnivoltaic is pioneering the integration of advanced battery technologies and robust charging infrastructures, tailored to meet the unique demands of these regions. By providing reliable and efficient solutions, Omnivoltaic is helping to bridge the gap between traditional and electric mobility, making electric motorcycles a viable and attractive option for millions of riders.

### The Business Model Challenge
Achieving the ideal balance between cost, convenience, and accessibility in electric motorcycle charging infrastructure is no small feat. The primary challenge lies in developing a sustainable business model that can support the widespread deployment of charging facilities without imposing prohibitive costs on consumers or businesses. Potential solutions could include public-private partnerships, government incentives, and innovative financing models that lower the barrier to entry for both providers and users. Additionally, leveraging renewable energy sources to power charging stations can further enhance the environmental benefits of electric motorcycles, making the entire ecosystem more attractive to environmentally conscious consumers.

Companies like Omnivoltaic are leading the way by developing scalable and adaptable business models that cater to the specific needs of regions in Africa, Southeast Asia, and Central Asia. Their approach not only addresses the technical aspects of battery and charging solutions but also ensures that these solutions are economically viable and accessible to a broad audience.

### Looking Ahead
The future of electric mobility, particularly electric motorcycles, hinges on our ability to integrate robust power supply solutions into the very fabric of transportation infrastructure. By treating batteries and charging facilities as essential components rather than supplementary additions, we can pave the way for a more sustainable and accessible electric motorcycle market. As we continue to navigate this transition, the collaboration between governments, businesses, and communities will be crucial in overcoming the challenges and unlocking the full potential of electric motorcycles.

In conclusion, the path to widespread adoption of electric motorcycles is paved with both opportunities and obstacles. By addressing the complexities of battery costs, charging convenience, and infrastructure development head-on, we can create an environment where electric mobility thrives. Companies like Omnivoltaic are instrumental in this journey, providing the necessary innovations and solutions to make electric motorcycles a cornerstone of sustainable transportation in Africa, Southeast Asia, and Central Asia. The journey may be challenging, but with thoughtful planning and innovative solutions, the vision of a sustainable, electric future is well within our reach.

### Dr. Wang Letters
Stay tunes for more insights and discussions in our upcoming Dr. Wang Letters, where we explore the evolving landscape of transportation and technology.

name: Omnivoltaic on the Global Stage: UN Habitat Assembly 2023
content:
In June 2023, Omnivoltaic proudly showcased its first sets of electric motorcycles at the UN-Habitat Assembly in Nairobi, Kenya. 

###### Event Snapshot
The event convened to explore solutions for sustainable urban development aligned with the theme, *“A sustainable urban future through inclusive and effective multilateralism: achieving the Sustainable Development Goals in times of global crises.”* 

The assembly highlighted the urgency of innovative and sustainable mobility solutions.

---

###### Event Highlights

Our participation stood as a testament to Omnivoltaic’s commitment to SDG 7 (Affordable and Clean Energy) and SDG 11 (Sustainable Cities and Communities). As an efficient electric motorcycle designed for both urban and rural settings, our solutions address the twin goals of reducing transportation emissions and providing affordable mobility options, particularly in underserved areas.

This event coincided with a pivotal moment for Kenya, as First Lady Rachel Ruto took a bold step toward championing sustainable transport. In a symbolic act, she cycled from State House to Gigiri, approximately between 25-35KM, just to emphasize the importance of sustainable transport modes and launching the *Global Alliance of Cities for Road Safety*. Her advocacy dovetailed perfectly with the goals of electric mobility, underscoring the need for collective action to build cleaner, safer cities.

Omnivoltaic’s presence at the assembly fostered collaborations with key players in the electric mobility ecosystem. Our CTO, featured on KBC News, engaged in meaningful dialogues about the opportunities and challenges in advancing e-mobility across Africa and beyond.

When asked about the benefits of electric motorcycles, this is what Dr. Huashan Wang had to say;

- *"For every litre of normal gas, you can drive with something like 35-45KM, and that will cost you probably 180-190KSH. For the same distance using electricity, it will cost you roughly 30KSH. This is a big cost differential comparing traditional fuel with electricity"*

These conversations underscored the importance of cross-sector partnerships to accelerate the adoption of electric vehicles globally. Specifically on why Omnivoltaic electric motorcycles, this is what our CTO commented as an added advantage;

- *"You can also swap out the traditional (to mean fuel-driven) engine, and insert an electric drive train into the traditional bike."*

**Here is a video snippet 🎥 of our CTO, [Dr. Huashan Wang, featured on the Kenyan news](https://res.cloudinary.com/oves/video/upload/v1732564737/MARKETING/OVES%20E-Bikes%20at%20the%20UN%20Assembly%202023/HW%20featured%20in%20the%20KBC%20News.mp4), courtesy of [Prime Edition with Tom Mboya](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GMUf5QNr1SU&t=2116s) by [KBC Channel 1 on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@KBCChannel1News/videos)**

---

###### The Big Picture: Empowering Africa’s E-Mobility Revolution

At Omnivoltaic, we understand that transitioning to sustainable mobility is not just about technology—it’s about aligning innovation with market needs and global goals. Our electric motorcycles embody this philosophy, offering a reliable, clean, and affordable alternative for individuals and businesses while contributing to the broader goals of reducing carbon footprints and fostering equitable development.

As we reflect on the UN-Habitat Assembly, we are energized by the partnerships formed and the shared vision of a sustainable future. Together with policymakers, private sector leaders, and local communities, Omnivoltaic is committed to driving transformative change in the mobility landscape, one electric motorcycle at a time.

---

###### Partner With Us

Are you ready to drive the future of energy and mobility in Africa? This milestone was just the start of an exciting journey!

Be sure to visit www.omnivoltaic.com and follow our social media pages for the latest developments. Contact us at team_sales@omnivoltaic.com for more detailed information.

OVES proudly joined the E-Mobility Association of Kenya (EMAK), a step that has since propelled us into exciting opportunities within the e-mobility space. 

---

###### Highlights from Our Journey So Far

**Africa E-Mobility Week 2024 Participation**

Omnivoltaic participated in the Africa E-Mobility Week 2024 held in Nairobi, where we had the privilege of highlighting our electric motorcycles models [ovEgo E-3 Plus](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/products/ovego-e-3-plus) and [ovEgo™ F-3](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/products/ovego-f-3). 
This event came at a pivotal moment, where it provided us with the perfect platform to understand the industry's dynamics, connect with like-minded stakeholders, and foster meaningful partnerships. 
- With over a decade of experience in the solar industry, Omnivoltaic has always championed the shift away from fossil fuels. Expanding to e-mobility aligns seamlessly with our ethos and marks a natural progression in our growth.

**The Largest E-Mobility Parade in Kenya**

Omnivoltaic proudly joined in Kenya's largest and historic e-mobility parade organized by EMAK—a first for our company. The parade united over 500 electric vehicles in a shared vision of sustainable transport. 
For us, it was more than just a showcase; it was an opportunity to interact with fellow players, learn about their offerings, and grasp the vast potential of the market. One key takeaway was the importance of addressing consumer concerns more deeply. Questions like “How easy is it to recharge your battery?” and “Can this battery serve multiple purposes, such as powering other systems?”
This interaction fueled our resolve to invest more in consumer-centric research and development. 
- One standout achievement sets us apart: we are among the few pioneers offering a fully functional fuel-to-electric conversion solution, and we will be talking more about this groundbreaking breakthrough in the next coming articles.

**Showcasing at the Global Off-Grid Solar Forum and Expo 2024**

The Global Off-Grid Solar Forum and Expo 2024 at KICC was a familiar yet exciting stage for Omnivoltaic. Having participated in this event for years, it was a home-ground opportunity to connect with our extensive network of clients and partners, who actually are  professionals in renewable energy and e-mobility.
Under EMAK’s umbrella, we showcased our e-mobility and charging solutions, specially tailored for African markets, which garnered significant interest. Our involvement highlighted not only our products but also EMAK’s purpose and the benefits of this new collaboration.
- By aligning with EMAK, we’re ensuring that our partners and clients are well-informed about where the market is headed and how they can benefit from emerging trends. 

---

###### The Big Picture: The road ahead is electrifying—let’s drive it together!
Kenya’s e-mobility sector is still in its infancy, and EMAK plays a crucial role in shaping the policies and frameworks that govern this transformative industry. 

By participating actively in this association, we aim to contribute to policies that protect and empower us and consumers.

###### Partner with Us
Whether you’re looking to collaborate on projects, develop charging infrastructure, or bring cutting-edge products to market, let’s create impactful solutions together.

Be sure to visit www.omnivoltaic.com and follow our social media pages for the latest developments. Contact us at team_sales@omnivoltaic.com for more detailed information.

#Omnivoltaic #EMobility #Sustainability #CleanTransport

name: Empowering Ideas: Fishing Community
content:
Artisan fishing communities play a critical role in regional economies and food security. However, they face significant obstacles in accessing reliable and affordable power. These challenges hinder their ability to improve productivity and adopt modern, sustainable practices. Modern Commercial and Industrial (C&I) Energy Systems present an opportunity to provide tailored solutions that address these needs, ensuring both environmental sustainability and economic growth.

###### The Scenario

Artisan fishing communities often operate in remote areas with little or no access to grid power. Their reliance on traditional methods and expensive polluting fossil fuels create inefficiencies and environmental harm. Limited infrastructure for cold storage further exacerbates post-harvest losses, while inadequate energy solutions for mobility and lighting hinder operational efficiency.

Key Challenges:

- **Remoteness** - Fishing communities are often far from grid power.
- **High Costs** - Dependence on diesel and kerosene increases operational expenses.
- **Economic Disadvantage** - Limited access to affordable energy leaves fishermen at a disadvantage compared to aggregating middlemen in the value chain.
- **Lack of Awareness** - Modern distributed power systems and efficient modular machinery are underutilized due to limited knowledge among communities and support organizations.
- **Post-Harvest Losses** - Insufficient cold storage infrastructure leads to significant spoilage.
- **Energy Deficits** - Inadequate power solutions hinder night-fishing operations and e-mobility adoption.

Addressing these challenges through innovative energy solutions can significantly improve livelihoods, reduce environmental impact, and foster community resilience.

---

###### Productivity Gains with Clean Energy Solutions

Adopting clean, renewable energy solutions can address the critical needs of artisan fishing communities while delivering substantial benefits:

- **Enhanced Productivity** - Reliable energy powers modern tools and reduces manual labor.
- **Environmental Sustainability** - Clean energy minimizes reliance on polluting fossil fuels, protecting local ecosystems.
- **Cost Efficiency** - Renewable energy reduces long-term operational expenses.

###### Community Energy Requirements

The diverse energy needs of artisan fishing communities can be categorized as follows:

**1. E-Mobility:**
- Electric boats for fishing operations.
- Electric tricycles for transportation and logistics.

**2. Night-Fishing Operations:**
- Portable and reliable lights for nighttime activities.
- Centralized charging hubs for lighting equipment.

**3. Cold Chain Solutions:**
- Ice-making machines for efficient flake ice production.
- Refrigerators and freezers to preserve fresh catches.

**4. Battery Charging:**
- E-bike and e-boat battery swap stations.
- Efficient distribution systems to meet community-wide energy needs.

---

##### Solution Sketch: Off-Grid Commercial and Industrial (C&I) Energy Systems

To meet the needs of fishing communities, a scalable Off-Grid C&I Energy System is proposed:

###### System Components

**1. Off-Grid Power Source:**

- A 60kWh battery coupled with a 30KW AC system powered by solar and LPG generator options.

**2. Battery Swap Station:**

- Shared batteries for e-bikes and e-boats.
- Streamlined battery swapping for ease of operation.

**3. Cold Storage:**

- Efficient ice-making machines to produce flake ice.
- Freezers to store ice and fish, extending freshness and market value.

**4. Charging Infrastructure:**

- E-Mobility Battery Swap Hub.
- Centralized hubs for charging night-fishing lights and onboard equipment.
- Optimized energy distribution to reduce waste.

###### Implementation Plan

**1. Assessment and Design:**
- Conduct energy needs assessments tailored to specific communities.
- Develop modular systems for phased deployment.

**2. Installation and Training:**
- Install energy infrastructure, including solar panels and batteries.
- Train local operators in system maintenance and operation.

**3. Monitoring and Optimization:**
- Implement smart energy management systems.
- Continuously monitor and adjust for optimal performance and scalability.

---

###### The Big Picture

Providing artisan fishing communities with modern, clean energy solutions can transform their productivity and economic stability. By addressing key needs such as e-mobility, cold storage, and night-fishing operations, these systems offer a sustainable pathway to progress. Their implementation can serve as a model for similar communities worldwide, demonstrating the potential of renewable energy to improve lives and protect the environment.

###### Partner with Us
[Join the discussion](url:https://productive.omnivoltaic.com/) in championing innovative energy solutions for artisan fishing communities. Together, we can bring sustainable progress to these vital ecosystems and their people.
Be sure to visit [www.omnivoltaic.com](http://www.omnivoltaic.com/) and follow our social media pages for the latest developments. Contact us at team_sales@omnivoltaic.com for more detailed information.

#Omnivoltaic #Productivity #Sustainability #CleanSolutions

content:
###### The Great Convergence of Technologies
**Electrifying the World Together!**

Imagine a world where electricity isn't a luxury, but a fundamental right for everyone, regardless of location or resources. Thanks to remarkable advancements in solar PV, lithium rechargeable battery, LED, efficient DC appliance, and IoT technologies, that world is within reach.

But this isn't just a story of innovation—it's a tale of accessibility and empowerment. With a global supply chain and logistics network, these cutting-edge solutions are no longer confined to select regions; they're accessible anywhere in the world. And it's not just about products—it's about quality standards, consumer awareness, and the tireless efforts of innovative manufacturers and institutional investors, all converging to make off-grid electric power a thriving industry.

**But here's the real kicker:** Energy poverty, once thought insurmountable, is on the brink of eradication. That's right—no more communities left in the dark, no more lives hindered by the lack of power. And the best part? We're doing it the clean, fair, and sustainable way.

But we're not just telling you about this revolution—we're inviting you to be a part of it. Join us as we explore the possibilities, share the successes, and chart a course towards a future where electricity is not just a dream, but a reality for all. Together, we can electrify the world and usher in a new era of empowerment and progress. Are you ready to be a part of history?

name: Turning Range Anxiety into Confidence
content:
Electric motorcycles are rapidly gaining traction as sustainable alternatives to traditional gasoline-powered bikes. However, "range anxiety"—the concern that a vehicle's battery will deplete before reaching its destination—remains a major concern, particularly in Africa, where long distances and limited charging infrastructure pose unique challenges.

---

###### Omnivoltaic's Technology: A Game Changer in E-Mobility

Omnivoltaic has positioned itself at the forefront of solving these challenges through cutting-edge battery technology, high-efficiency power management, and practical infrastructure solutions. With our  electric motorcycles, [Model E-3 Plus](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/products/ovego-e-3-plus) and [Model F3](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/products/ovego-f-3), we are not only extending range but also redefining convenience for riders and distributors alike.

***1. Superior Range and Performance***

While many electric motorcycles in Africa struggle with limited battery capacity, Omnivoltaic’s [ovEgo™ E-3 Plus](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/products/ovego-e-3-plus) leads the pack with an impressive 70-100 km range per charge and a top speed of 85 km/h. Compared to other models in the market that average 60-80 km per charge, Omnivoltaic outperform many competitors by providing riders with extended travel capabilities, ensuring that their daily routes—whether for work or deliveries—are uninterrupted.

***2. Fast Charging and Battery Swapping Solutions***

To eliminate downtime, Omnivoltaic offers multiple charging and battery replacement options:

- **Rapid Charging:** The [E-Mob-CHG30](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/products/copy-of-e-mob-chg30) and [Qix Power 2KW](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/products/qix-power-2kw) fast charger is designed for high-efficiency charging, cutting our Model E-3 Plus battery’s charge time from the industry standard of 3-4 hours to just 2 hours. With a 3000W direct current output and support for up to 1C charging rates, it ensures safe, reliable, and long-lasting performance without compromising battery health. Riders can plug in their motorcycle at home, just like charging a phone, and wake up to a fully charged bike.

- **Battery Swapping:** While Uganda leads in battery swapping stations, Kenya is catching up. Omnivoltaic is actively equipping distributors with the [E-Mob-CHGRack-N](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/products/electric-moblity-charging-rack-n) for battery swapping capabilities, ensuring riders have quick and convenient access to fully charged batteries without long waiting periods.

***3. Optimized Battery Technology for Efficiency and Versatility***

Our lithium-ion battery pack is not just for mobility—it is a multi-purpose energy solution. Riders using Omnivoltaic batteries benefit from:

- **Emergency Power Backup for Homes:** The same battery can be used to power lights, charge phones, and run small appliances in case of blackouts.

- **Real-Time Battery Monitoring:** With voltage, temperature, and health tracking, riders always know their battery’s condition, reducing unexpected failures.

- **Geo-tracking & Theft Prevention:** Riders can monitor the location of their battery, improving security and preventing theft.

- **Smart Battery Management System (BMS):** The BMS ensures longer battery lifespan, delivering higher value compared to conventional battery packs in other motorcycles.

***4. Designed for Africa: Rugged and Reliable***

Many e-motorcycles in the market are not optimized for Africa’s rugged terrain. Omnivoltaic’s ovEgo™ E-3 Plus is built specifically for African roads and conditions, featuring:

- **High-Torque Performance:** Ensures smooth acceleration even on rough roads.

- **Durable Shock Absorbers:** Handles bumpy terrains with ease.

- **IP65-Rated Waterproofing:** Protects against rain and dust, unlike standard motorcycles that risk short-circuiting when exposed to harsh weather.

---

###### The Big Picture: A Brighter Future for Africa’s Riders

At Omnivoltaic, we’re not just solving range anxiety—we’re building a new era for electric mobility in Africa. By combining cutting-edge battery technology with practical, real-world solutions, we’re making EV motorcycles a reliable, long-term investment for riders and distributors alike. For riders, this means confidence on the road—no more worrying about whether they’ll make it to their next stop.
For distributors, this means new business opportunities—a chance to be part of Africa’s growing e-mobility revolution.

---

###### Ready to partner with us?

Omnivoltaic is a global leader in energy solutions, offering [Off-Grid Solutions](https://off-grid.omnivoltaic.com/), [Cross-Grid Solutions](https://cross-grid.omnivoltaic.com/), [Productive Use of Energy](https://productive.omnivoltaic.com/), [E-Mobility](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/) tailored for African markets.

📲 Follow us on social media for updates, success stories, and new innovations. Let’s build the future of electric mobility—together!

name: new set article2
content:
#### Habits
We use batteries. We throw them into recycle bin. We buy new ones. We never really think about HOW much of a waste this process really is. Wastes in terms of money. AND in terms of the environment.

#### Recycle or Reduced Cycle?
People talk about  "battery recycling" . But how much of the battery materials are recycled? By what means?

The best way to think of recycling or environment protection should be conservation. Conserve the amount of resources that go into making a product. Then get the most useful life out of it. Build products that LAST a long time, at realistic cost.

One AppTORRENT rechargeable li-ion battery can be used hundreds of times like new. Save money AND save the environment!

name: Power Triads off-grid
content:
###### Introducing Omnivoltaic's Groundbreaking Powers

**Picture this:** Power Generation, Storage, and Usage—three dynamic elements seamlessly woven together to form the backbone of any off-grid power system. And at the heart of it all lies Omnivoltaic's game-changing Power Triad™, a visionary design concept that's reshaping the way we harness and utilize energy.

**Here's how it works:**

Solar panels capture the boundless energy of the sun, converting it into a renewable power source that fuels our world. But what good is all that power if we can't store it for when we need it most? That's where batteries come in, serving as the trusty guardians of energy, storing it up for a rainy day (quite literally!).

But wait, there's more! Omnivoltaic's Power Triad™ doesn't stop there. It's not just about generating and storing power—it's about putting it to good use. From illuminating homes with basic lighting to powering essential appliances and even income-generating tools, Omnivoltaic products are designed to meet the diverse needs of our customers with unmatched efficiency and reliability.

**But here's the real kicker:** Omnivoltaic isn't just in the business of selling products—it's on a mission to empower consumers, both now and in the future. With our innovative Power Cascade™ model, we're giving customers the flexibility to scale up their power consumption as their needs evolve, ensuring they always have access to the energy they need, when they need it.

So whether you're lighting up your home, running your favorite appliances, or building a brighter future for yourself and your community, Omnivoltaic's Power Triad™ is here to power your journey every step of the way. Join us as we illuminate the path to a brighter, more sustainable tomorrow—one watt at a time!

name: A Brief History of the Electric Battery
content:
Here’s a brief history of how the quest of scientists and innovators for improved power, weight, cost, and other factors have led to the modern battery that we know today.

- Voltaic Pile  (1799)

Italian physicist Alessandro Volta created the first electrical battery in 1799 that could provide continuous electrical current to a circuit. The voltaic pile used zinc and copper for electrodes with brine-soaked paper for an electrolyte.

- Daniell Cell  (1836)

British chemist John Frederic Daniell created The Daniell cell in 1836 to improve upon the limited service life of the Pile’s Cell. The Daniell cell used a copper pot filled with copper sulfate solution, which was further immersed in an earthenware container filled with sulfuric acid and a zinc electrode. The Daniell cell’s electrical potential became the basic unit for voltage, equal to one volt.

- Lead-acid  (1859)

The lead-acid battery was the first rechargeable battery, invented in 1859 by French physicist Gaston Planté. Lead-acid batteries are low in cost and high in surge current, making them suitable for automobile starter motors and energy storage even today, with tens of billions of USD sales globally.

- Nickel Cadmium  (1899)

NiCd batteries were invented in 1899 by Waldemar Jungner in Sweden, paving the way for modern technology, though they are being used less and less because of cadmium’s toxicity, giving up market share to batteries that are more familiar to us today.

- Alkaline Batteries  (the 1950s)

The modern alkaline battery was invented by Canadian engineer Lewis Urry in the 1950s. Using zinc and manganese oxide in the electrodes, the battery type gets its name from the alkaline electrolyte used: potassium hydroxide. Alkaline batteries are used in regular household devices from remote controls to flashlights, with billions of alkaline cells sold in the world each year.

- Nickel-Metal Hydride  (1989)

The development of the NiMH spanned decades, initially sponsored by Daimler-Benz and Volkswagen AG, and the first commercially available cells were introduced in 1989. The NiMH formulation uses a hydrogen-absorbing alloy instead of toxic cadmium. This makes it more environmentally safe – and it also helps to increase the energy density. NiMH batteries were widely used in power tools, digital cameras, and many electronic devices.

- Lithium-Ion  (1991)

Sony released the first commercial lithium-ion battery in 1991. Lithium-ion batteries have high energy density and have several specific cathode formulations such as Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP), Lithium Cobalt Oxide (LCO), Lithium nickel manganese cobalt oxide (NMC), and Lithium nickel cobalt aluminum oxide (NCA).

Different lithium-ion chemistries are suited to specific applications, and the landscape is continually changing with new innovations.

name: Oasis™ Series - Off-Grid Integrated AC/DC Power Solutions - Copy
content:
###### Introducing the Oasis™ Series by Omnivoltaic: Your Gateway to Off-Grid Power Freedom!

Picture this: You're out in the wilderness, miles away from civilization, yet you're still connected to the world. That's the magic of the Oasis™ series - a lineup of state-of-the-art, integrated AC/DC power solutions designed to keep you powered up and productive, no matter where your adventures take you.

Let's take a closer look at what sets the Oasis™ series apart:

**Versatility in Power:** The Oasis™ series offers a range of models, from the compact PEG-OVT10 to the robust PEG - Oasis™ 5x3, each packed with energy capacities ranging from 1048Wh to 2688Wh. With integrated home energy systems delivering up to 5000W of continuous power, you'll never have to worry about running out of juice again. Plus, with a variety of ports including Type C, Quick Charge USB, Normal USB, AC sockets, and even a Cigarette Lighter Receptacle, you can power multiple devices simultaneously with ease.

**Charging Freedom:** Whether you're basking in the sun or plugging into an AC outlet, the Oasis™ series has got you covered. Charge up using any solar panel within the specified ratings or simply plug into an AC outlet using any charger/adapter rated for 25A. It's convenience and versatility rolled into one.

**Safety First:** At Omnivoltaic, safety is our top priority. That's why the Oasis™ series is equipped with top-notch safety features including over-charging/discharging protection, over-current load protection, high-temperature protection, low-temperature charge protection, and more. So you can power up with peace of mind, knowing you're in good hands.

**Performance Guaranteed:** With quality components, efficient cooling systems, and advanced battery cell chemistry, you can trust that your Oasis™ Power Generator will deliver reliable power, day in and day out.

But the Oasis™ series isn't just about power - it's about enhancing your lifestyle and enabling new possibilities. Check out some of the exciting use cases:

- **Entertainment:** Elevate your outdoor gatherings, picnics, or camping trips with reliable power support for entertainment devices such as speakers and lighting, ensuring a joyful and enriched experience.
- **Camping:** Enjoy the great outdoors with confidence, knowing that your Oasis™ Power Generator has your back, providing reliable power for camping lights, chargers, and small appliances, enhancing camping comfort and convenience.
- **Emergency Relief:** In critical situations, the Oasis™ Power Generator acts as an emergency power source, supporting lighting, communication devices, medical equipment, and more, helping people effectively cope with natural disasters or emergency scenarios.
- **Refugee Camps:** Improve living conditions for residents in temporary living environments like refugee camps, providing essential power to meet basic living needs.
- **Backup Power:** Whether on outdoor adventures or extended outdoor activities, the Oasis™ Power Generator serves as a dependable backup power source, ensuring the reliable operation of devices and enhancing user safety and convenience.
- **Lifestyle Convenience:** From open-air concerts to outdoor movie nights, the Oasis™ Power Generator offers convenient power support, making outdoor living more comfortable, safe, and diverse.

With the Oasis™ series by your side, the possibilities are endless. Experience the freedom of off-grid power like never before with Omnivoltaic.


1. [PEG-OVT10](https://cross-grid.omnivoltaic.com/products/peg-ovt10) - with energy capacity of 1048Wh
2. [PEG - Oasis™ 1x1](https://cross-grid.omnivoltaic.com/products/acdc-solar-generator-oasis-1x1) - with energy capacity of 1075Wh, paygo enabled
3. [PEG - OVT20](https://cross-grid.omnivoltaic.com/products/ac-dc-solar-generator-oasis%E2%84%A2-2x2-4-%E7%9A%84%E5%89%AF%E6%9C%AC) - with energy capacity of 2016Wh
4. [PEG - OVT30](https://cross-grid.omnivoltaic.com/products/peg-ovt30) - with energy capacity of 2688Wh
5. [PEG - Oasis™ 5x3](https://cross-grid.omnivoltaic.com/products/acdc-solar-generator-oasis-5x3) - with energy capacity of 2688Wh

name: Off-Grid Power Triad - Backbone of any Off-Grid Power Systems
content:
###### Introducing Omnivoltaic's Groundbreaking Powers

**Picture this:** Power Generation, Storage, and Usage—three dynamic elements seamlessly woven together to form the backbone of any off-grid power system. And at the heart of it all lies Omnivoltaic's game-changing Power Triad™, a visionary design concept that's reshaping the way we harness and utilize energy.

**Here's how it works:**

Solar panels capture the boundless energy of the sun, converting it into a renewable power source that fuels our world. But what good is all that power if we can't store it for when we need it most? That's where batteries come in, serving as the trusty guardians of energy, storing it up for a rainy day (quite literally!).

But wait, there's more! Omnivoltaic's Power Triad™ doesn't stop there. It's not just about generating and storing power—it's about putting it to good use. From illuminating homes with basic lighting to powering essential appliances and even income-generating tools, Omnivoltaic products are designed to meet the diverse needs of our customers with unmatched efficiency and reliability.

**But here's the real kicker:** Omnivoltaic isn't just in the business of selling products—it's on a mission to empower consumers, both now and in the future. With our innovative Power Cascade™ model, we're giving customers the flexibility to scale up their power consumption as their needs evolve, ensuring they always have access to the energy they need, when they need it.

So whether you're lighting up your home, running your favorite appliances, or building a brighter future for yourself and your community, Omnivoltaic's Power Triad™ is here to power your journey every step of the way. Join us as we illuminate the path to a brighter, more sustainable tomorrow—one watt at a time!

name: Technical Support Engineer - Philippines
content:
- **Country:** Philippines
- **Position:** Technical Support Engineer
- **Type:** Full-time, On-site
- **Deadline:** Open until filled

**Overview:**

We are looking for a **Technical Support Engineer** to provide expert assistance on Omnivoltaic’s solar [Off-Grid products](https://off-grid.omnivoltaic.com/), [Energy Storage Solutions](https://cross-grid.omnivoltaic.com/), and [E-Mobility](https://mobility.omnivoltaic.com/). This role involves troubleshooting, installation, and customer support to ensure seamless product performance and customer satisfaction.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Provide technical support and troubleshooting for solar off-grid lamps, systems, and energy storage products.
- Assist customers with product installation, setup, and configuration.
- Diagnose and resolve technical issues via phone, email, or in-person.
- Report product issues and recommend improvements to the R&D team.
- Conduct product maintenance checks to prevent recurring technical problems.
- Develop and update technical documentation, manuals, and FAQs.
- Train customers and partners on best practices for product usage.
- Stay updated on solar energy technology and industry trends.

**Qualifications:**

- Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Renewable Energy, or a related field.
- Minimum 2 years of experience in technical support or engineering, preferably in the solar energy industry.
- Strong knowledge of solar off-grid systems, energy storage solutions, and electrical troubleshooting.
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office and technical tools.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Willing to travel to customer sites as needed.
- Fluency in English and Filipino (Tagalog) is preferred.

📩 **To Apply:** Send your resume to lorraine_jeremillo@omnivoltaic.com and CC alpha_guo@omnivoltaic.com.
